text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically asks for the listing of applicable benefits of Italian Dirigente (manager/executive) status, such as minimum wage according to the applicable CCNL, mandatory life insurance (€300k or €400k), and mandatory subscription to the \"FASI\" retirement fund. The candidate answer mentions the 'Quadri' classification exists and affects notice periods, severance, and working time, but it fails to list the specific mandatory benefits required by the criterion (CCNL minimum wage, mandatory life insurance amounts, FASI fund).", "criterion_id": "f26d87b9-6487-433e-bd75-510bc812635d"}
